title: HADIZ Lash Mirror for Eyelash Extensions, Stainless Steel Eyelash Mirror Square, Lash Extension Tool, Beauty Mirror (Gold)
features: ✅ Premium Quality: Handcrafted with surgical grade stainless steel. The material is durable and resistant, capable to pass the test of time. Also, it can be sterilized and safely used for the next customer. The handle has an easy grip and you can adjust the angle as you please. Also, the eyelash mirrors squares are very easy cleaned and disinfected

✅ Professional Lash Mirror: The sleek design and high-quality material of the eyelash mirror for extensions will make you feel like a professional and you will make an impression in front of your clients.
✅ Lightweight Mirror: The lash extension mirror is lightweight and compact, allowing you to control it with easy and adjust it how you find it suitable.

✅ Perfect Size: Large square mirror allows you the whole view of the lash line for eyelash extensions. The eyelash mirror have the perfect size to let you do your meticulously work. Our rectangular eyelash mirror provides a ‘Wide-Screen’ view of the lash extensions.

✅ Beauty Accessories: For a beauty salon, lash extension accessories are a necessity if you want to satisfy all customers. You can take large pictures of eyelash extensions work with this beautiful tool to show your customers so they can view accuracy and quality of Lashes. Our eyelash extension mirror has the perfect size and shape to help you perform your work as a professional!
description: HADIZ Large Mirror allows you to view every angle of your client's lashes to ensure their lashes are perfect. A must have tool for all lash technician to create a flawless set of eyelash extensions. Also a perfect tool for exceptional photos of your great work!

Our Premium Quality Stainless Steel Large Detachable lash Mirror is carefully handcrafted to perfection.it isthe premium quality you don’t have to worry about the metal being lost or the screws being loose.

The stainless-steel square mirrors set can be easily placed on the client’s cheekbone due to its perfect size and shape. The handle has an easy grip and you can adjust the angle as you please. Also, the mirrors are very easy to clean and can be disinfected.

Perfect angle to view your work without any headache. You can take large pictures of eyelash extensions work with this beautiful tool to show your customers so they can view accuracy and quality of Lashes.
